H0.text: What is the surname of the title character in Kingsley Amis' novel 'Lucky Jim'. Wilson

H1.text: What is the surname of the title character in Kingsley Amis' novel 'Lucky Jim'. Fletcher

H3.text: What is the surname of the title character in Kingsley Amis' novel 'Lucky Jim'. Dixon

A4.text: The protagonist of Lucky Jim is James (Jim) Dixon.

A5.text: Lucky Jim follows the academic and romantic tribulations of James (Jim) Dixon.
